'''Radiant Spincrystal 4''' is an item used in the [[Furnishings]] [[Euphonium Unbound: Winding]] or [[Euphonium Unbound: Soaring]] to unlock the [[Soundtrack]] [[A Day in Mondstadt]] in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

It is located on top of boxes behind [[Schulz's Blacksmith]].
